page.title: 17POPULATION STATISTICS (2)
page.content:
EMPLOYMENT STATISTICS COLLOCTED FROM PUPILS AT WHERWELL SCHOOL. HOUSEWIVES-3 CAR MECHANIC-1 COMPUTER USERS-3 NURSES-2 BANK CLERK-1 CARPENTER-1 SECRETARY-1 FILM-MAKER-1 JOURNALIST-1 FARM MANAGER-1 WARDEN FOR OLD PEOPLE-2 AGRICULTURAL WORKERS-3 PUBLICAN-2 GARAGE MANAGER-1 PLUMBER-2 CHAUFFEUR-1 HOUSEKEEPER-1 WATER BOARD OFFICIAL-1 CLEANER-1 COOK-1
3 WORK IN ANDOVER,3 IN MIDDLE WALLOP,5 WORK IN TOWNS IN AN ARC OF UP TO 30 MILES. 11 WORK IN THE VILLAGE AND 5 AT HOME. 12 TRAVEL TO WORK BY CAR,AND 4 BY VAN.
